scripts.build: npm run clean && npm install && npm-run-all --parallel tsc tsc-esm webpack
scripts.build-lib: npm run clean && npm install && npm-run-all --parallel tsc tsc-esm
scripts.build-web: npm run clean && npm install && npm run webpack
scripts.dev-lib: npm run clean && npm install && npm-run-all --parallel tsc-dev
scripts.dev-lib-esm: npm run clean && npm install && npm-run-all --parallel tsc-esm-dev
scripts.dev-web: npm run clean && npm install && npm-run-all --parallel webpack-dev serve
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm install && npm-run-all --parallel tsc-dev tsc-esm-dev webpack-dev serve
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && npm run push-to-npm
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && npm run push-to-npm
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && npm run push-to-npm
